Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.27795416]HIV-1 IIIB:inhibition of virus infection in MT-2 cells(IC50=8.8 ±0.4 nM); inhibition of peptide against cell-cell fusion between H9/HIV-1 IIIB cells and MT-2 cells(IC50=14.8 ± 2.8 nM);HIV-1 Bal:inhibition of virus infection in MT-2 cells(IC50=6.7 ± 0.5 nM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide inhibits HIV fusion by binding to the hydrophobic grooves on the N-terminal heptad repeat (NHR) trimer and blocking six-helix-bundle (6-HB) formation.

Literature.Title: Creating an Artificial Tail Anchor as a Novel Strategy To Enhance the Potency of Peptide-Based HIV Fusion Inhibitors.
Literature.Author: Su S, Zhu Y, Ye S, Qi Q, Xia S, Ma Z, Yu F, Wang Q, Zhang R, Jiang S, Lu L.
